titleStmt.title: An account of Mr. Parkinson's expulsion from the University of Oxford in the late times in vindication of him from the false aspersions cast on him in a late pamphlet entituled, The history of passive obedience.
titleStmt.author: Parkinson, James, 1653-1722.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for and are to be sold by Richard Baldwin ...,

notesStmt.note: Purportedly by an observer of the case, but according to Anthony Wood and DNB was published anonymously by Parkinson.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
